intent_atoms.description: Run the VoiceOver regression pass on macOS 14+ and iPadOS 17+ hardware to capture announcements for each Focus shortcut
VoiceOver regression pass must be executed on physical devices running macOS 14+ and iPadOS 17+ and all Focus shortcuts’ announcements captured and archived under Task G8
Any VoiceOver QA notes or screenshots must be attached to DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE/155_G8_Accessibility_and_Keyboard_Shortcuts/ after physical testing is complete
Automated regression coverage must remain green when running swift test in the container environment
